summary: Fix next_id to return first unused positive integer instead of max+1

changes.description: Rewrote next_id to find first unused positive integer ID, ignoring negative IDs
Added 4 regression tests for non-contiguous IDs, negative IDs, mixed IDs, and zero/negative prevention

risks: Behavior change: next_id now returns first available ID instead of max+1. Existing workflows expecting max+1 will see different behavior.
